main.description: Full Stack React Developer by Day, Founder && Freelancer by Night
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a passion for coding. Having always wanted to do computer science, as soon as i got my Baccaulaureat i joined ESP ( Ecole Superieur Polytechnique de dakar ) i worked to increase my knowledge and gain some skills. I love what i do and i'm good at it
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
